sqlMap.insert: /* GodTableDAO.insert */ insert into TB_GOD_TABLE ( TABLE_ID, /* 테이블ID */ TABLE_NM, /* 테이블명 */ COLUMN_NM, /* 컬럼명 */ COLUMN_NM2, /* 컬럼명2 */ COLUMN_NM3, COLUMN_NM4, COLUMN_NM5, COLUMN_NM6, COLUMN_NM7, COLUMN_NM8, COLUMN_NM9, COLUMN_NM10, COLUMN_NM11, COLUMN_NM12, COLUMN_NM13, COLUMN_NM14, COLUMN_NM15, COLUMN_NM16, COLUMN_NM17, COLUMN_NM18, COLUMN_NM19, COLUMN_NM20, COLUMN_NM21, COLUMN_NM22, COLUMN_NM23, COLUMN_NM24, COLUMN_NM25, COLUMN_NM26, COLUMN_NM27, COLUMN_NM28, COLUMN_NM29, COLUMN_NM30, USE_AT, /* 사용여부 */ FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID ) values ( #tableId#, #tableNm#, #columnNm#, #columnNm2#, #columnNm3#, #columnNm4#, #columnNm5#, #columnNm6#, #columnNm7#, #columnNm8#, #columnNm9#, #columnNm10#, #columnNm11#, #columnNm12#, #columnNm13#, #columnNm14#, #columnNm15#, #columnNm16#, #columnNm17#, #columnNm18#, #columnNm19#, #columnNm20#, #columnNm21#, #columnNm22#, #columnNm23#, #columnNm24#, #columnNm25#, #columnNm26#, #columnNm27#, #columnNm28#, #columnNm29#, #columnNm30#, #useAt#, #frstRegistPnttm#, #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: /* GodTableDAO.update */ update TB_GOD_TABLE set COLUMN_NM = #columnNm#, /* 컬럼명 */ COLUMN_NM2 = #columnNm2#, /* 컬럼명2 */ COLUMN_NM3 = #columnNm3#, COLUMN_NM4 = #columnNm4#, COLUMN_NM5 = #columnNm5#, COLUMN_NM6 = #columnNm6#, COLUMN_NM7 = #columnNm7#, COLUMN_NM8 = #columnNm8#, COLUMN_NM9 = #columnNm9#, COLUMN_NM10 = #columnNm10#, COLUMN_NM11 = #columnNm11#, COLUMN_NM12 = #columnNm12#, COLUMN_NM13 = #columnNm13#, COLUMN_NM14 = #columnNm14#, COLUMN_NM15 = #columnNm15#, COLUMN_NM16 = #columnNm16#, COLUMN_NM17 = #columnNm17#, COLUMN_NM18 = #columnNm18#, COLUMN_NM19 = #columnNm19#, COLUMN_NM20 = #columnNm20#, COLUMN_NM21 = #columnNm21#, COLUMN_NM22 = #columnNm22#, COLUMN_NM23 = #columnNm23#, COLUMN_NM24 = #columnNm24#, COLUMN_NM25 = #columnNm25#, COLUMN_NM26 = #columnNm26#, COLUMN_NM27 = #columnNm27#, COLUMN_NM28 = #columnNm28#, COLUMN_NM29 = #columnNm29#, COLUMN_NM30 = #columnNm30#, USE_AT = #useAt#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #lastUpdtPnttm#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# where TABLE_ID = #tableId#
sqlMap.delete: /* GodTableDAO.delete */ update TB_GOD_TABLE set USE_AT = 'N' where TABLE_ID = #tableId#
sqlMap.select:
/* GodTableDAO.select */ select TABLE_ID as tableId, /* 테이블ID */ TABLE_NM as tableNm, /* 테이블명 */ COLUMN_NM as columnNm, /* 컬럼명 */ COLUMN_NM2 as columnNm2, /* 컬럼명2 */ COLUMN_NM3 as columnNm3, COLUMN_NM4 as columnNm4, COLUMN_NM5 as columnNm5, COLUMN_NM6 as columnNm6, COLUMN_NM7 as columnNm7, COLUMN_NM8 as columnNm8, COLUMN_NM9 as columnNm9, COLUMN_NM10 as columnNm10, COLUMN_NM11 as columnNm11, COLUMN_NM12 as columnNm12, COLUMN_NM13 as columnNm13, COLUMN_NM14 as columnNm14, COLUMN_NM15 as columnNm15, COLUMN_NM16 as columnNm16, COLUMN_NM17 as columnNm17, COLUMN_NM18 as columnNm18, COLUMN_NM19 as columnNm19, COLUMN_NM20 as columnNm20, COLUMN_NM21 as columnNm21, COLUMN_NM22 as columnNm22, COLUMN_NM23 as columnNm23, COLUMN_NM24 as columnNm24, COLUMN_NM25 as columnNm25, COLUMN_NM26 as columnNm26, COLUMN_NM27 as columnNm27, COLUMN_NM28 as columnNm28, COLUMN_NM29 as columnNm29, COLUMN_NM30 as columnNm30, USE_AT as useAt, /* 사용여부 */ FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as frstRegistPnttm, FRST_REGISTER_ID as frstRegisterId, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM as lastUpdtPnttm, LAST_UPDUSR_ID as lastUpdusrId from TB_GOD_TABLE where TABLE_ID = #tableId#
and USE_AT = #useAt#

/* GodTableDAO.selectList */ select TABLE_ID, /* 테이블ID */ TABLE_NM, /* 테이블명 */ COLUMN_NM, /* 컬럼명 */ COLUMN_NM2, /* 컬럼명2 */ COLUMN_NM3, COLUMN_NM4, COLUMN_NM5, COLUMN_NM6, COLUMN_NM7, COLUMN_NM8, COLUMN_NM9, COLUMN_NM10, COLUMN_NM11, COLUMN_NM12, COLUMN_NM13, COLUMN_NM14, COLUMN_NM15, COLUMN_NM16, COLUMN_NM17, COLUMN_NM18, COLUMN_NM19, COLUMN_NM20, COLUMN_NM21, COLUMN_NM22, COLUMN_NM23, COLUMN_NM24, COLUMN_NM25, COLUMN_NM26, COLUMN_NM27, COLUMN_NM28, COLUMN_NM29, COLUMN_NM30, USE_AT, /* 사용여부 */ FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID from TB_GOD_TABLE where 1 = 1
and USE_AT = #useAt#
